sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,MODEL_NAME ,MODEL_NO ,PATH ,DESC ,SUPER_NO ,REMARK ,RESERVED FROM AGENT_MODEL WHERE 1=1 AND AGENT_MODEL.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(MODEL_NAME) Like '%'||(#model_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MODEL_NO) Like '%'||(#model_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PATH) Like '%'||(#path:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DESC) Like '%'||(#desc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUPER_NO) Like '%'||(#super_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REMARK) Like '%'||(#remark:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM AGENT_MODEL WHERE 1=1 AND AGENT_MODEL.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(MODEL_NAME) Like '%'||(#model_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MODEL_NO) Like '%'||(#model_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PATH) Like '%'||(#path:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DESC) Like '%'||(#desc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUPER_NO) Like '%'||(#super_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REMARK) Like '%'||(#remark:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
